title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 98-3.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 98-3.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to apply audit and reporting standards upon managed care organizations (MCOs). These standards are modeled on the standards imposed on public companies by the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
98-3.1

Adopted
by

New

York State Register November 10, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 45, eff. 11/10/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
